article.headline: Mercer 88, Savannah State 63
article.story: MACON, Ga. (AP) -- Will Emerson had 21 points and 10 rebounds to lead Mercer to an 88-63 victory over Savannah State in the Bears' home opener Thursday night. Mercer (1-1), which beat the Tigers for the sixth time in six meetings, also got 15 points and nine rebounds from Aaron Shaddean off the bench. The Bears shot just 45.1 percent, but that compared to 36.5 percent for Savannah State (1-5), and they outrebounded the Tigers 56-32. Joseph Flegler scored 18 points to lead Savannah State, which trailed 43-31 at halftime. Javon Randolph was the only other Tiger in double figures, with 11 points and a team-high six rebounds.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
